Property.name: twalk_sw
Property.HelpText: Restores Tails's alternate jump grunt from the Dreamcast version.

Property.name: ewalk_sw
Property.HelpText: Restores Eggman's alternate jump grunt from the Dreamcast version.

Property.name: cwalk_sw
Property.HelpText: Restores the Chao Walker's alternate jump grunt from the Dreamcast version.

Property.name: dwalk_sw
Property.HelpText: Restores Big's alternate jump grunt from the Dreamcast version, or the completely unheard Dark Chao Walker's alternate jump grunt.

Property.name: random
Property.HelpText: Older versions of this mod naively switched the voice line randomly. In reality, which grunt plays is based on your speed. This setting restores the old, random behavior.
